fr.skyost.skyowallet.economy.account.holder

Class MoneyHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.skyost.skyowallet.economy.account.holder.MoneyHolder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BankBalanceHolder, WalletHolder

    public abstract class MoneyHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to holds an amount of money and to perform some operations on it (add, subtract, ...).

      • setAmount

        public void setAmount(double amount,
                      double taxRate)
        Sets the amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount.
        taxRate - The tax rate for the new amount. Will be applied only if the new amount is superior than the specified amount and if the account does not have the bypass permission.

      • setAmount

        public void setAmount(double amount,
                      double taxRate,
                      boolean round)
        Sets the amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount.
        taxRate - The tax rate for the new amount. Will be applied only if the new amount is superior than the specified amount and if the account does not have the bypass permission.
        round - If you want to round the specified amount (will not round the amount if changed by an event).
